description: A TG file is a guitar tablature document created by TuxGuitar. It contains both musical score and guitar tablature. Guitar tablature is a form of musical notation that represents finger positions on instrument’s fretboard.

instructions:
If you have TuxGuitar file (with .tg extension), you can open it using TuxGuitar software. Here are the steps:

Launch TuxGuitar on your computer.Go to “File” menu.Choose “Open” from menu options.Locate and select your TuxGuitar file (.tg).Click “Open” to open and view your file in TuxGuitar.

This process allows you to access and work with your TuxGuitar files within TuxGuitar application.
